original_text: But I will come to visit you again soon, if the Lord wants me to. Then I will find out what these proud people are really like. It is not just the words that they say. I will find out if they have the power of God.
korean_text: 주께서 허락하시면 내가 너희에게 속히 나아가서 교만한 자들의 말이 아니라 오직 그 능력을 알아보겠으니

sentences.original_text: But I will come to visit you again soon
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 곧 당신을 다시 방문하러 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if the Lord wants me to
what these proud people are really like
sentences.korean_translation: 이 교만한 사람들이 정말 어떤 사람들인지

sentences.original_text: It is not just the words that they say
if they have the power of God
